Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class DifferenceOfGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.DifferenceOfGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class DifferenceOfGaussian
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Difference of Gaussians is a feature enhancement algorithm that involves the subtraction of one blurred version of an original image from another.
